user_instruction: 'Tell John to reply to me (emily@innovatenow.com) with his thoughts on potential collaboration, and remind him he can check his Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Looking Forward to Your Thoughts on Collaboration Opportunities

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. When you have a moment, could you please send your thoughts on potential collaboration opportunities to Emily at emily@innovatenow.com? She’s eager to move our discussion forward.

Feel free to check your Gmail and Notion workspaces for any reference materials we’ve shared that might help shape your response.

Thank you, and looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
